required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of Multiple Doses of JS002 in Patients With Hyperlipidemia..
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy, as Well as Immunogenecity, Pharmacokineticks and Pharmacodynamics of Multiple Doses of JS002 on Stable Statin Therapy in Patients With Hyperlipidemia.

brief_summary.textblock: JS002 is a recombinant humanized anti-PCSK9 monoclonal antibody.

primary_outcome.measure: Percent change from baseline in low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) to week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute value change from baseline in low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Twelve weeks after the last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent change from baseline in Total Cholesterol(TC、HDL-C、non-HDL-C、VLDL-C、Apo B、Apo A1、Lp(a) and TG )
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Twelve weeks after the last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage change from baseline TC/HDL-C ratio
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Twelve weeks after the last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent change from baseline in Apolipoprotein B (Apo B)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Twelve weeks after the last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent change from baseline in Apolipoprotein A-I (ApoA-I)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Twelve weeks after the last dose

other_outcome.measure: Number of subjects who develop detectable anti-drug antibodies (ADAs)
other_outcome.time_frame: Twelve weeks after the last dose
Twelve weeks after the last dose

other_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in proprotein convertase total / free pcsk9
other_outcome.time_frame: Twelve weeks after the last dose

arm_group.description: Participants received one of 3 dose regimens of JS002 administered as multiple subcutaneous doses.
Participants received matching placebo dose regimens by subcutaneous injection.

facility.name: Fuwai Hospital Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
